title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: bundle and run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with a single CLI or REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API, published on npm as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, available on PyPI as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (PyPI: langchain-ollama) to use Ollama models as LLMs or embedders.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama with multi-model chat, file uploads, RAG and admin panel.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama, published to Maven Central.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with readline and conversation history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into inline code copilots with autocomplete and chat.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) for running Ollama server in containers.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for fine-tuning, RAG, function-calling and deployment patterns with Ollama.

title: ollama-gptcli
summary: Lightweight Python CLI that mimics ChatGPT CLI but uses any Ollama model locally.

title: ollama-telegram-bot
summary: Self-hostable Telegram bot that chats with Ollama models and supports group conversations.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB + Streamlit UI.

title: ollama-nvidia-jetson
summary: Build scripts and docs to run Ollama on NVIDIA Jetson devices with GPU acceleration.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that streams Ollama responses into Discord threads with slash commands.

title: ollama-macos-menu
summary: Native macOS menu-bar app to start/stop Ollama server and switch models from the toolbar.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds an Ollama chat pane and commands to summarize or rewrite notes.
